description:
Bring on the season with the cool vintage style of the Stimmersee Shirt for men—a modern, slim-fit button down that pairs perfectly with backyard BBQs and drinks al fresco.

Made with a blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester, this shirt is also as sustainable as it is stylish, which makes it an all-round winner in their opinion.
name: Prana Stimmersee Shirt - Standard - Mens
